column1: The great advantages of this apparatus are as follows: 1. From the moment the lid is closed one can work by daylight. 2. The method of washing in moving water is combined with that of complete change of water. 3. The emulsion never comes in contact with metal. 4. Whoever wishes to prepare dry gelatine only requires
column2: when the washing is over and the vessel perfectly emptied
column3: to leave the emulsion to drip for a time
column4: and then to lift out the sieve and its contents and place it in a suitable vessel with absolute alcohol. The latter should be changed once
column5: and when sufficient water has been extracted the sieve should be withdrawn from the vessel and the emulsion allowed to dry spontaneously. In this way all trouble occasioned by changing from vessel to vessel is avoided
column6: and there is no loss of material.
